=== My multimedia keys (volume, brightness etc) do not function ===

The multimedia keys such as volume and brightness controls are often handled specially by your machines BIOS.  If those keys are not triggering expected behaviour you should consult the <nowiki>[[Hotkeys-Troubleshooting]]</nowiki> guide.
